content.rendered:
A luxurious and inviting fireplace is the focal point to any room. It’s a place to gather, converse and share meaningful moments. No one understands this better than Eldorado Stone®, manufacturer of the world’s most authentic architectural stone veneer and the Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds collection. This series of hand-crafted limestone fireplace surrounds can transform an average fireplace into a masterpiece. The most recent addition to this collection, The Soho Boutique™, brings elegance and understated perfection to any space.

With its clean lines and enduring style, The Soho Boutique™ creates a luxurious space on a smaller scale, working in a wide variety of architectural styles, whether it features expansive views, minimalist décor or classic character. As with all the profiles, The Soho Boutique™ is available in three colors: Oyster Shell, Oak Barrel and Summer Wheat. These colors are then offered in three surface finishes: Honed, a smooth surface; Travertine, which is a deeper, more weathered, rustic surface; and, Antique Castello Finish, which recreates the appearance of fireplace surrounds found in historic dwellings across Europe.

The Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds are a fraction of the cost compared to natural limestone surrounds and the installation takes half the time with the company’s proprietary manufacturing and installation processes. With profiles ranging from traditional to transitional to contemporary, there is a fireplace surround style for all styles and budgets.

Whether the right profile for a room is The Soho Boutique™, The Giada™, The Palacio™ or any of the other beautiful profiles, each is a distinctive piece of artistry. Each profile includes legs and a mantelpiece to frame the fireplace. All designs are hand-crafted of a proprietary blend of natural limestone and other minerals and materials, yielding a gorgeous and timeless hearth-surround. Even more unique is the fact that each fireplace surround is hand-finished and sanded in a labor-intensive four-step process, guaranteeing that every Eldorado Fireplace Surround is a truly spectacular one-of-a-kind piece.

 

Download Press Release
